Package in.application

Class PEMService

java.lang.Object
in.application.PEMService
public class PEMService
extends java.lang.Object
The class contains most of the operations related to PEM application.

This class prepares a menu and various methods are present to handle the user action. The class makes use of Repository to store the data. Also using ReportService to generate different required reports.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) Repository repo
    Declare a reference of repository by calling a static method which returns a singleton repository object.
    (package private) ReportService reportService
    Declare a reference of ReportService to call different methods to calculate reports.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PEMService()
    Call this constructor to create PEMService Object with default details.

  • Field Details

    • repo

      Repository repo
      Declare a reference of repository by calling a static method which returns a singleton repository object.

    • reportService

      ReportService reportService
      Declare a reference of ReportService to call different methods to calculate reports.

  • Constructor Details

    • PEMService

      public PEMService()
      Call this constructor to create PEMService Object with default details. When this method is called, it will deserialize the object It will read the data from the file and will return back to the object

  • Method Details

    • showMenu

      public void showMenu()
      This method prepares a PEMApp menu using switch-case and infinite loop. Also wait ask for user choice.

    • printMenu

      public void printMenu()
      This method prints a menu(Command Line Interface CLI menu).

    • onAddCategory

      public void onAddCategory()
      This method is taking expense category name as input to add new category in the system. And will also save to the Repository

    • onCategoryList

      public void onCategoryList()
      Call this method to print existing category List

    • onExpenseEntry

      public void onExpenseEntry()
      Call this method to enter expense detail. The entered details will be added in Repository

    • onExpenseList

      public void onExpenseList()
      The method prints all entered expenses

    • onMonthlyExpenseList

      public void onMonthlyExpenseList()
      This method is called from menu to prepare month-wise-expense-total. It is using ReportService to calculate the report. The returned result is printed by this method. This method invokes a call to generate report, then result is printed by this method.

    • onYearlyExpenseList

      public void onYearlyExpenseList()
      This method is called from menu to prepare yearly-wise-expense-total. It is using ReportService to calculate the report. The returned result is printed by this method. This method invokes a call to generate report, then result is printed by this method.

    • onCategorizedExpenseList

      public void onCategorizedExpenseList()
      This method is called from menu to prepare category-wise-expense-total. It is using ReportService to calculate the report. The returned result is printed by this method. This method invokes a call to generate report, then result is printed by this method.

    • onExit

      public void onExit()
      This method stops JVM. Before that it's storing the repository Permanently It's like a shut down hook.................................when an application closes, some tasks are to be performed Its closing PEM Application.

    • prepareSampleDate

      public void prepareSampleDate()
      This method is preparing sample data for the testing purpose. It should be removed once the application is tested OK.

    • serialize

      public void serialize​(java.lang.String file, java.lang.Object obj)

    • deser

      public java.lang.Object deser​(java.lang.String file)
